sentences.en: a short fat man with no hair on his head
sentences.cn: 光头的矮胖男人

sentences.en: Applying the dye can be messy, particularly on long hair.
sentences.cn: 涂抹染发剂可能会搞得一团糟，特别是长发。

sentences.en: He had long unkempt hair and a stubbly chin.
sentences.cn: 他的头发又长又乱，脸上胡子拉碴。

sentences.en: He was a tall, thin man with grey hair.
sentences.cn: 他是个瘦高个，头发灰白。

sentences.en: Her cousin, a hairdresser, was perming her hair as a special treat.
sentences.cn: 她表兄是美发师，正在免费给她烫发。

sentences.en: Her hair was short and dark.
sentences.cn: 她的头发又短又黑。

sentences.en: His hair was disheveled, and his face was unshaven and gray.
sentences.cn: 他头发凌乱，没刮胡子，脸色苍白。

sentences.en: His hair was plastered down to his scalp by the rain.
sentences.cn: 他的头发淋雨后紧贴在头皮上。

sentences.en: His long, uncovered hair flew back in the wind.
sentences.cn: 他那露在外面的长发随风向后飞舞。

sentences.en: Moretti ran a hand through his disordered red hair.
sentences.cn: 莫雷蒂用手理了理他那一头凌乱的红发。

sentences.en: Sarah lifted her hand and started twirling a strand of hair.
sentences.cn: 萨拉抬起手来开始用手指缠绕一缕头发。

sentences.en: She shrugged a stray lock of hair out of her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她把一缕散发从眼前甩开。

sentences.en: She unbound her hair and let it flow loose in the wind.
sentences.cn: 她把头发解开，让它随风飘动。

sentences.en: She walked forward and embraced him and stroked his tousled white hair.
sentences.cn: 她走上前拥抱他并轻抚他凌乱的白发。

sentences.en: Teddy ran thick fingers through his unruly thatch of hair.
sentences.cn: 泰迪用自己的粗手指头捋了一下浓密蓬乱的头发。

sentences.en: The cat has left white hairs all over the sofa.
sentences.cn: 白色的猫毛掉得满沙发都是。

sentences.en: There he stood: hair in wild tangles, dark stubble shadowing his chin.
sentences.cn: 他站在那儿，头发乱成一团，下巴上一片黑胡茬。

sentences.en: they sent him to America, just to &B{get him out of their hair}.
sentences.cn: 他们送他去美国，只是图个眼不见为净。

sentences.en: you escaped death &B{by a hair's breadth}.
sentences.cn: 你是死里逃生。

sentences.en: You'll also get expert advice on keeping your hair in good condition.
sentences.cn: 你还会获得有关如何保持良好发质的专家建议。
